items.summary: Remove the visible call-to-action button labeled exactly “Start Gamepad Testing” from the marketing/SEO content block component (frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx), and remove any now-unused imports and functions that only existed to support this button (e.g., the scroll handler).

Update the “How to Use the Online Gamepad Tester” section text in frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx to remove the instruction that references clicking the removed “Start Gamepad Testing” button, while keeping all remaining marketing/SEO text intact and in English.
